major_axis_length.long_name: The length of the major axis of the ellipse that has the same normalized second central moments as the region

minor_axis_length.long_name: The length of the minor axis of the ellipse that has the same normalized second central moments as the region

equivalent_diameter.long_name: Diameter of a circle with the same area as the particle

minr.long_name: Minimum row index of the particle bounding box

maxr.long_name: Maximum row index of the particle bounding box

minc.long_name: Minimum column index of the particle bounding box

maxc.long_name: Maximum column index of the particle bounding box

saturation.calculation_method: Computed as the percentage of the image covered by particles relative to the maximum acceptable coverage

index.long_name: Index of the particle in the dataset
index.calculation_method: Sequential numbering of particles in the dataset

export_name.long_name: Name of the exported particle ROI file

time.calculation_method: Extracted from the timestamp of the observation
